ingredients.item: 1 pack 6 essential Waitrose Tomatoes, cut into wedges
50g essential Waitrose Pitted Green Olives, halved
1 pack essential Waitrose 6 British Chicken Thigh Fillets

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C, gas mark 6. Place the tomatoes and olives in a roasting tin and drizzle over the oil and vinegar. Top with the chicken, sprinkle with Parmigiano Reggiano and roast for 20 minutes or until there is no pink meat and the juices run clear.
Sprinkle over the basil and bake for a further 5 minutes.
